data.title: how do they stay on business?
data.text: seated quickly but after 10 minutes had to flag down our waitress to give her our order. Pretty straightforward salad and burger. after waiting another 40 minutes (during which we were told our food would be right up) we gave up and left. could be a great place for lunch if you either can stand a 2 hour lunch or decide to take a half day of vacation.

data.title: it was O.K.
data.text: When we came we were not greeted for awhile. It was busy and dinner time so I understood. We got seated and still waited a long while before a waitress even came over. for the food... it was OK, we got some sort of like pulled pork nachos, there was Zero meat on the nachos and the price you would think you would get more. But then came the burgers, although I give it to this restaurant for having amazing toppings to add...the beef patty itself is not good AT ALL. No flavor at all. My husband and I are Foodies and were very disappointed with the flavor and price for what you get and have not been back as it ruined a good date night. and No we did not bother to get a manager as it was a date night and we barely even saw the waitress...

data.title: Great Place
data.text: We tried this on a whim for lunch.  We were very impressed with a dining room that was full of light and very airy.  Tables were well spaced to give the patrons a feeling of separation.  We were there for lunch and the menu was very interesting.  A good selection of salads and appetizers.  My wife chose the portobello "burger" on a pretzel roll and I had a grilled tenderloin.  The portobello was well prepared and offered lots of flavor.  My tenderloin was a piece of pork loin that had been hand pounded and properly grilled.  No tenderization with this sandwich which was served on a pretzel bun.  Both sandwiches were served with home made french fries.  Service was outstanding.  We were taken care of by Reese who made the experience that much more enjoyable.  The pace of the meal was relaxing, not feeling of being rushed.  This is pretty special in today's serve 'em and get 'em out.  Highly recommend this establishment.  In face, we are already making plans to try the dinner menu soon.

data.title: Great food and atmosphere
data.text:
Love this place. Unique twist on down-home food. Amazing quality, great beer, and really cute place. 
Run by very nice people as well. We had a party in their private room as well and it was perfect.

data.title: Good food and good atmosphere
data.text: The crab appetizer I'd unbelievable!  Burgers very good, well priced. The salad large and fresh.  The desserts were offered after we were too full to even try.

data.title: Wonderful new menu
data.text: Great menu with lots of options. Had enough spinach salad with sides of risotto and brussel sprouts. Everything was tasty and well-presented. Good service too.

data.title: Good stop for lunch
data.text: Had lunch at Me and Billy.  I had a burger and fries and both were very good.  Service was also good and the prices were competitive.  I had a good lunch experience here and would return.

data.title: Yup, Do It, Go In There!
data.text: Rode my bicycle over there today to meet some colleagues and students. Walked in and they were already on appetizers but the waiter was there in seconds. While we talked, a manager came over and engaged us in conversation, found out this was a class, and gave the students some great advice on event planning and hospitality (reason they were touring Davenport). His info was spot on. Later another manager visited us, even though she was busy gettimg ready for an event. Classy. Food was great, I had the gazpacho salad because I was biking so wanted to eat light. LOL, pleny of greens, way more corn, tomatoes, peppers, etc. for $8 and no iceburg lettuce filler! So much fresh veggies had to stop short. Others had burgers made to order, substitutions no problem, and they were huge. One took half a burger home. Everyone was satisfied. Bottles of cold water kept being placed on the table a bonus touch, no pitchers of ice water poured through your conversation, etc.  Also, all windows where we ate so great watching the downtown bustle around us! Great, chill, classy, not pricey.  Best spot in Davenport so far!

data.title: Small portion sizes
data.text:
I come here once a month when I'm in town. The portion sizes of some of the dishes are small. Their tipsy chicken has great flavor, but the actual chicken portion is small and considering the cost of the dish, not a good value. Last time I visited, the server said their tenderloin had been recognized as one of the best in the city. I ordered the grilled tenderloin sandwich and the bun was bigger than the actual piece of pork. 

Everything else about this place is great. I like the atmosphere and you wont find better service anywhere else, but they are not providing a fair value on some of their menu items.

owner_response.author: Frances M, Owner at Me & Billy Kitchen and Bar, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thanks for your feedback! We always strive to provide value to our customers, so we take your comments to heart. While trying to keep our prices reasonable, nearly everything is made fresh in-house, so costs can add up! We just finalized our new menu and kept your feedback in mind. We hope you can visit the next time you're in town!
Cheers,
Fran
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great view
data.text: The choices were great a lot of us did build your own burger. Everything we had was greased reasonable prices wait staff was great. It was a little loud but it was a Friday night and very busy. We will go again.

data.title: Great beer special on Wednesdays
data.text: Nice beer choices, 2 for 1 on Wednesday. Have had a nasty version of John's White Ale on tap for a month! Untap and send it back! Atmosphere is fine. Surprised to see families. Had the tenderloin on pretzel bun. WAY too salty for me. The nachos on other hand are yummy, just overpriced. Good location for business lunch. Lots of windows to watch action on street.. Love the bottle of water they bring to table.

data.title: Food is fantastic, amazing staff and great atmosphere!
data.text:
Everything on the menu seems to be amazing and never have I ever received a bad meal. **Love the french fries**
Drinks are always great, service is even better and the atmosphere is just always fun. 
It's always busy, which should tell you how great this place is!
Favorite restaurant on the Iowa side!

data.title: My first Choice for Davenport
data.text: Great food, and a great selection of beer.  This place is always busy.  But it should be, Billy comes to every table and greets everyone in the place.  He goes out of his way to make sure you visit is memorable.  This attention to detail is contagious as most everyone in the place cares about the customer. Only one change needed...if you order a drink at the bar and then move to a table they need a manager to approve the transfer...this system is designed for bartender tipping and not the guest, this can be fixed it just needs the attention.

data.title: Great Place for Food or Drinks
data.text: What a friendly place,  very refreshing to see old time customer service.   Food is excellent,   a surprise for a bar atmosphere.   Try to Pork Chop,  it's to die for.

data.title: Fun, Friendly, Fantastic!
data.text: This was my first visit, and it won't be my last! The atmosphere and waitstaff were fun and inviting. There were many interesting menu choices. I enjoyed a cheeseburger with cheese curds on a pretzel roll with cheese dipping sauce. Delish! The vodka lemonade shake up was a great twist on the county fair's version. The pulled pork nachos were an amazing starter. Everyone left very full and very satisfied. The owner personally went around to make sure guest satisfaction was on point. Wow!

data.title: not impressed
data.text: I have eaten here twice and both times the food was okay - even though it has been recommended.  Food that was served was cold and only okay - probably won't be returning.

data.title: Terrible food..
data.text: We were highly recommended by a local resident to try at this place and unfortunately our experience came out as one of worst places so far experienced. We ordered burgers with fries. What got served was some fries in lot of salt. Fries were almost black or fried till they turn black. It couldn't go worse than what we experienced.

owner_response.author: Frances M, Owner at Me & Billy Kitchen and Bar, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hi Gaurav,
I'm very sorry to hear about your experience. While that's very disappointing to hear, we always want to try to improve. Would you be willing to provide more information about your visit (specific date/time) so we can work on a solution? Any details you can provide will help us.
Thanks,
Fran
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Lovely surprise
data.text: Our first visit to me and Billy. I wasn't sure what to expect but we thought it was great. We had the drink special and fried cheese curds. I don't know how they did it but they were really soft on the inside and really crispy on the outside, it was like eating a cheesy pillow and I mean that in a good way. All of our entrées were good. Service was also very good. We will be back!

data.title: Brunch
data.text: Went there on a Sunday early afternoon for the first time. Walked in and loved to ambiance of the room, the people working were very friendly. Went to get a Bloody Mary which was just o k pretty generic. Read menu and realized it was a little broad for our taste, were are very picky eaters so we did get and appetizer and it was very good, if you really love different foods this is the place for you.

data.title: Good food
data.text: Bad service experience. The food was good.  Very small menue.  Location is great, drinks are good.  The owner is an awesome guy.

owner_response.author: Frances M, Owner at Me & Billy Kitchen and Bar, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hi Hajro,
Thanks for your feedback! Can you provide more details about your service experience so we can try to improve?
Thanks,
Fran
owner_response.title: Owner Response
